There were no other sightings in Campbell on or around June 29th 2011
Summary: Green Orb Chased by the Military
divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the bedroom straightening out he blankets on the bed wit the window open for fresh air. All of a sudden I heard loud military chopper passing over soto see a low flying military chopper chasing a green orb. It was roughly about 1000 feet above (maybe a bit less than that). I yelled for my husband to look and as he ran down the hall, I pushed him out of the way to make it to the living room to grab the video cam and go outside. (moved to evidence section)fg I grabbed the video cam and went out the front door just in time to see it still flying towards my complex then overhead. I did get it on film so I have about 30 seconds of film. I have not reviewed it yet because I wanted to fill out this report. My husband experienced this event with e as well. The speed of the chopper and orb was maybe about 10-15 mph if it were cars on the road. They were low enough to rattle things on the shelves and walls. I have been keeping all of my footage and photos to myself and sharing it with alternate researchers (Not Mufon), but I felt that just maybe someone else will report in this time and report the same thing tha my husband and I experienced.
